item.description: I-10 West - Exit 30 Offramp at US-90/US-98 - Battleship Parkway. Turn left for US-90/US-98 West to USS Alabama Memorial Park/Vietnam and Korean Veterans Memorial. Turn left for US-90/US-98 East/To US-31.

item.title: US-90 East/AL-59 South at US-90/AL-59 Split
item.description: US-90 East/AL-59 South at US-90/AL-59 Split in Robertsdale. Use US-90 East for Pensacola (Florida). Continue south on AL-59 for Robertsdale and Gulf Shores.

item.title: Water St. North at I-165 and US-90
item.description: Water St. North at I-165 and US-90 (Beauregard St.). Turn left for US-90 West/To I-10/To US-98. Continue straight for I-165/US-90 East/To US-43/To US-98 Truck

item.description: Water St. North approaching I-165/US-90 Junction (Beauregard St.) in Mobile.

item.description: I-10 East approaching Exits 15A-B - US-90/Theodore/Tillman’s Corner. Entering the city of Mobile.

item.description: Bus. US-90 East offramp to US-90 East. Use right lanes for US-90 East/Claiborne Ave. Use left lanes for I-10 East/Slidell.

item.title: End Bus. US-90 East at I-10 - New Orleans
item.description: End Bus. US-90 East at I-10 in New Orleans. Use Exit 13B for US-90 East/Claiborne Ave. Approaching I-10 East to Slidell and I-10 West to Baton Rouge.

item.description: TX-54 south at BL-10/To US-90. Turn left for BL-10 West, turn right for BL-10 East/TX-54 South, to US-90.
